notes: No tweaks were required, game plays great with nvidia beta drivers.  It does crash when trying to exit the game, but otherwise has been stable since the latest patch.

notes: performance was bad (integrated graphics), but game ran, played a bit of the tutorial. Sound was good but laggy. On a desktop this would probably run great. Crashes when closing the game
